Field Detail

DEFAULT_SERVER_NAME

public static final String DEFAULT_SERVER_NAME
A default name for akubra-rmi-servers. Used for RMI registration when none supplied.

registry - the RMI registry
registryPort - the RMI registry port
exporter - the exporter for the BlobStore

RemoteException - on any other error in export
Method Detail

shutDown

public void shutDown(boolean abort)
              throws AccessException,
                     RemoteException
Shutdown this server.

Parameters:
abort - if true, will abort all current in progress calls and close all connections.
Throws:
AccessException - when the caller does not have permission to shutdown
RemoteException - on any other error in registry unbind

ensureRegistry

public static Registry ensureRegistry(int port)
                               throws RemoteException
Ensures that an RMI registry is running at the given port on localhost.

Parameters:
port - the RMI registry port
Returns:
the client side stub to RMI Rgistry
Throws:
RemoteException - on an error in starting up the registry

ensureRegistry

public static Registry ensureRegistry(String host,
                                      int port,
                                      RMIClientSocketFactory csf,
                                      RMIServerSocketFactory ssf)
                               throws RemoteException
Ensures that an RMI registry is running at the given port on the given server.

Parameters:
host - the RMI registry host
port - the RMI registry port
csf - the client-side socket factory for making calls to the remote object
ssf - the server-side socket factory for receiving remote calls
Returns:
the client side stub to RMI Rgistry
Throws:
RemoteException - on an error in starting up the registry
